thread.title: Guardians of the Galaxy director James Gunn teases Vol 2: "Nebula is an important character"
thread.title_full: Guardians of the Galaxy director James Gunn teases Vol 2: "Nebula is an important character"

title: Guardians of the Galaxy director James Gunn teases Vol 2: "Nebula is an important character"
text:
11:56   Twitter Share on Google+ Guardians of the Galaxy director James Gunn has teased fresh details about the upcoming sequel Vol 2 .Responding to fans' questions during a Facebook Q&A , the filmmaker suggested that viewers should expect to see a lot more of Karen Gillan's villain Nebula. 
© Marvel Studios Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2: Everything you need to know including spoilers, soundtrack and release date "Nebula is an important character [in the film]," he said (via Comic Book Resources ).And confirming that the Guardians will be adding to their team, Gunn commented: "I'm not going to give names and I won't give numbers either, but there will be at least one new character in Guardians of the Galaxy ." 
© Marvel Studios He also reckons there's every chance there will be a third Guardians film, saying: "If the second one does well. You guys will have to go and see the second one."There's a lot of other Marvel cosmic properties that I'd be interested in helping usher to the screen. I talk about it a lot but, if I said too much here, Marvel might track me down and shoot me."As long as I'm working with Marvel, I'll probably be working on Guardians and Guardians -related projects." 
© Marvel / Disney Gunn added that Chris Pratt's Peter Quill will be the only earthling on Vol 2 , and Drax (Dave Bautista) will have an issue with Baby Groot (Vin Diesel). Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2 is planned for April 28, 2017 in the UK and May 5, 2017 in the US.
